resources.string: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Wisdom cannot be imparted. Wisdom that a wise man attempts to impart always sounds like foolishness to someone else ... Knowledge can be communicated, but not wisdom. One can find it, live it, do wonders through it, but one cannot communicate and teach it
If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other
we have a very strict privacy policy, all your data belongs only to you
By using this app, agree to its terms of use and privacy policy
